# Cargar las librerias

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(FielDHub)
```

# Diseño aumentado

```{r}
aug_RCBD <- RCBD_augmented(
  lines = 120,
  checks = 4,
  b = 6, 
  repsExpt = 1, 
  l = 2,
  random = TRUE,
  exptName = "Cassava_2022", 
  plotNumber = c(1001, 2001),
  locationNames = c("FARGO", "CASSELTON"),
  nrows = 12,
  ncols = 12,
  seed = 1987
)

aug_RCBD

fb <- aug_RCBD$fieldBook

plot(aug_RCBD)
```
